oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Allman Brothers Band at Bethel Wood
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Allman Brothers Band; Weir, Bob; Bethel Woods Center for the Arts; Split Fountain Printing;
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Two color window card (black and split fountain, green to yellow, on white) announcing the Allman Brothers Band with Bob Weir and Ratdog at the Bethel Woods Center for the Arts on August 12. Poster features woodcuts of mountains, flames, a forest, and moon.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Bethany Taylor
